Credential Profile is commonly called.description: The name of the credential profile, as it is commonly called.  This is the name that should be used to refer to the credential profile in other documents and discussions.

Credential Profile Description.description: A brief description of the credential profile.

Credential Format.description: The format of the credential format. If possible this should be a link to a specification of the format.

Signing Algorithm.description: The format of the signing algorithm. If possible this should be a link to a specification of the format.

Revocation Algorithm.description: The format of the revocation algorithm. If possible this should be a link to a specification of the format.

Key Management (Issuer).description: The format of the key management. If possible this should be a link to a specification of the format.

Key Management (Holder).description: The format of the key management. If possible this should be a link to a specification of the format.

Trust Management.description: The format of the trust management. If possible this should be a link to a specification of the format.

Formal Specification.description: A link to a formal specification of the credential profile.

IPR Policy.description: What is the policy regarding intellectual properties associated with this technology?

Implementations.description: A list of implementations of this technology.
